info.name: Egle
info.description:
DESIGN BY:
Michel Boucquillon

MATERIALS:
The stem is adjustable in all directions thanks to a spherical pivot positioned on the base. The diffuser, fitted with a concentrating lens, rotates 360Â° on the vertical axis, enabling to point the light beam in different positions. When the diffuser is directed downwards vertically, the base acts as a reflector. The slightly concave form of the base enables to use it as an object-holder. Materials: chromed or painted

INFORMATIONS:
Led Total power 3,5Wn
warm white 4000Kn
Lighting Output 140 lm
